effect.en: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. Switch Spoink with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
effect.fr: Le Pokémon Défenseur est maintenant Endormi. Échangez Spoink avec l’un de vos Pokémon de Banc.

description.en: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from Clamperl on its head.
